comments.html:
Hi Ivan,


i have to disagree at this point because Himawan Nugroho -- http://brokenpipes.blogspot.com/ -- is always good for a excellent post and i have the felling that this guy is never on vacation... Well his blog isn´t that much a technical blog like yours but very very interesting too. Recently he wrote about "Interview @ CCIE Lab".


Regards,

Gernot Nusshall
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html:
Hi Gernot!

Thanks for bringing that blog to my attention. As you've guessed, I'm primarily publishing links to blog posts focused on technical details similar to topics I'm discussing in my blog ... and I'm well aware there are tons of other good things out there.

Best regards
Ivan
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
